attributes.action: Make the display of hygiene rating mandatory for food industry businesses.
attributes.additional_details: Basically, do you want people getting food poisoning, or nah? Just sign the petition and get the filthy places shut down and stopped.
attributes.background: Businesses with a hygiene rating of zero can currently hide that fact, and continue being absolute pigs, at the risk of public health, and for the benefit of their wallet. I firmly believe that if a business is forced to display their hygiene rating, they will be much more likely to make an effort.
